component.name: Animated Counter
component.description: An animated counter component that displays numerical values with smooth counting animations and transitions. Perfect for statistics display, achievement counters, and metric presentations with customizable animation duration and easing functions.

variants.name: Minimalism
variants.description: A polished animated counter implementation with smooth number transitions, clear visual presentation, responsive sizing, and smooth animation effects. Effectively presents numerical data with engaging animation effects that draw attention and enhance visual appeal.

variants.name: Skeuomorphism
variants.description: Animated Counter implementation in Skeuomorphism style

variants.name: Material Design
variants.description: Animated Counter implementation in Material Design style

variants.name: Terminal CLI
variants.description: Animated Counter implementation in Terminal CLI style

variants.name: Cyberpunk
variants.description: Animated Counter implementation in Cyberpunk style
